#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
#include<iterator>
#define MAX 1000001
using namespace std;
int prime[MAX]={0};
vector<int>primenum;
vector<int>balanceprime;
void sieve(){
 prime[0]=prime[1]=1;     
 int j;
 for(int i=2;i<MAX;i++){
     j=2;
   if(!prime[i]){
     primenum.push_back(i);            
     while(i*j<MAX){
                     
      prime[i*j++]=1;              
     }             
   }      
 }    
}
void mark_balaceprime(){
 vector<int>::iterator itr2=primenum.begin()+2;     
 
 for(vector<int>::iterator itr=primenum.begin();itr!=primenum.end();++itr,++itr2)
  
  if(!prime[(*itr+*itr2)/2]&&!((*itr+*itr2)%2))
    balanceprime.push_back((*itr+*itr2)/2);    

};
int main(){
 sieve();
 mark_balaceprime();
 
 int t,n;
 cin>>t;
 while(t--){
  cin>>n;           
  cout<<balanceprime[n-1]<<endl;          
 }   
 return 0;    
}
